<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get a user invitation</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v2/user_invitations/{user_invitation_uuid}"}></MethodEndpoint>


Returns a single user invitation by its UUID.
## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The UUID of the user invitation.","in":"path","name":"user_invitation_uuid","required":true,"schema":{"example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
